title: Jared Leto says Tron: Ares is releasing at the ‘perfect time’ as film explores AI and ethics
description: Disney’s highly anticipated sci-fi film Tron: Ares is set to hit theatres this week, releasing in English, Hindi, Tamil, and Telugu. The film, which delves into the complex relationship between humans and Artificial Intelligence, is being hailed by its lead actor Jared Leto as a story arriving at just the right moment. title: SEN SANDERS: AI must benefit everyone, not just a handful of billionaires
description: Bernie Sanders warns that artificial intelligence and robotics could replace nearly 100 million American jobs over the next decade, including 40% of nurses and 89% of fast food workers.
content:
Everybody agrees that artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics are going to have a transformative impact on our country and the world.
There are strong disagreements, however, as to what those impacts will be — who will benefit from them and who wil... [8103 chars]

title: Order from disordered proteins: Physics-based algorithm designs biomolecules with custom properties
description: In synthetic and structural biology, advances in artificial intelligence have led to an explosion of designing new proteins with specific functions, from antibodies to blood clotting agents, by using computers to accurately predict the 3D structure of any given amino acid sequence.

title: Deshbandhu College Hosts National Workshop on Contemporary Media and Journalism
description: New Delhi [India], October 6: Deshbandhu College, University of Delhi, successfully organized a three-day National Workshop on Contemporary Media and Journalism, 27th-29th September, 2025, bringing together over 100 participants from various colleges to engage with leading voices from the media industry. From the impact of artificial intelligence on newsrooms to the rise of mobile journalism, the workshop brought together some of India's most respected media voices to inspire and challenge the next generation of journalists.

title: When artificial intelligence starts to hurt your health
description: Artificial intelligence is advancing healthcare with improved diagnostics and accessibility. However, it also raises concerns about environmental damage and healthcare issues.

title: Sam Altman says GPT-5 critics are wrong, calls it a big leap toward real scientific AI
description: OpenAI launched GPT-5 in August 2025, sparking strong debate and mixed reactions within the AI community. While critics pointed to unmet promises and initial technical issues, OpenAI leadership maintains that the new model marks significant progress, especially for specialised scientific and coding tasks. This article explores the lead-up to the launch, the public response, expert opinions, and OpenAIs evolving approach to artificial general intelligence (AGI).
content: OpenAI chief executive Sam Altman has defended the company’s latest language model, GPT-5, saying it is a major step forward in artificial intelligence despite the early wave of criticism. A month after its rocky debut, Altman claims the new model is... [4179 chars]
